description:
UPDATE: For those who missed the opportunity to sign up during the introductory offer period, effective 3:00PST June 10th, 2014, the first 500 students that sign up before June 30th will get the course at 90% off! That's just $5! Use the offer code ONLYFIVEBUCKS

Instructor Mike Smith, a Canadian telecommunications project manager with over 10 years experience using, teaching and consulting for using Microsoft Excel, teaches users the basic and intermediate level functions of Microsoft Excel.

The lectures at the time of publishing number 33, and more are expected as demand dictates. All lectures are video based, and an Excel file for working along with the videos is included with the first lecture.

Students can expect to complete the course in about 8 hours, with allowance for practicing weaker areas of knowledge.

This course is for anyone looking to make their life simpler through tracking critical data, or to gain an advantage in the workplace through applicable knowledge of an industry standard software.
title: Microsoft Excel 2013 Intro and Intermediate Training
